content: हत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [हन्-क्त] {@--1@} Killed, slain. {@--2@} Hurt, struck, injured; <ls>Mu. 3. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Lost, perished. {@--4@} Deprived or bereft of. {@--5@} Disappointed, frustrated; वयं तत्वान्वेषात् हताः <ls>Ś. 1. 24.</ls> {@--6@} Impeded, obstructed. {@--7@} Utterly ruined, extinguished, destroyed. {@--8@} Multiplied, see हन्. It is often used as the first member of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘wretched’, ‘miserable’, ‘accursed’ ‘worthless’; अनुशयदुःखायेदं हतहृदयं संप्रति विबुद्धं <ls>Ś. 6. 6</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 28</ls>; कुर्यामुपेक्षां हतजीवितेऽस्मिन् <ls>R. 14. 65</ls>; हतविधिलसितानां ही विचित्रो विपाकः <ls>Śi. 11. 64.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Killing, striking. {@--2@} Multiplication.
